body: Since I made an AMA on my alt and got a bunch of shit I'm doing one on my main account. Ask me literally anything. I might answer in a video but don't expect anything too massive.
body_tagged: Since I made an AMA on my alt and got a bunch of shit I'm doing one on my main account. Ask me literally anything. I might answer in a video but don't expect anything too massive.
title: Hi. AMA.

replies.body:
1) how old are you
2) what's ur ral name
3) what's ur favorite moment on Avicus
4) what's ur favorite MapDev
5) who's your favorite Moderater/ SrModerator

1) how old are you

replies.body: How does one 8-block and does me always jokingly accuse you of hacking annoy you?
replies.body_tagged: How does one 8-block and does me always jokingly accuse you of hacking annoy you?

replies.body:
@Remy they're lovely
@King
1) I'm turning 420 this June :D
2) Well my initials are in my IGN.
Major
League
Gamer
People look up to me in school.
3) When I got banned for the 3rd time.
4) Geor
5) Naydurr
@Avicus Ghost client and yes, it does get annoying after a while.

replies.body: Would you rather, not have any PvP skills ( you couldn't even learn how to PvP ) or never play MC again?
